title: East Africa: Bitpesa Launches BitPesa Trade to Allow 24/7 Bitcoin Trading
text:
Nigeria: Boko Haram - Telecoms Firms Deactivate 38 Million Lines By Baraka Jefwa 
Bitpesa has launched a new product dubbed; BitPesa Trade, which will allow Bitcoin traders to conduct their business on the platform 24/7. 
Apart from being able to make a trade at any time of the day, some of the other improvements that come with BitPesa Trade are as follows: 
One can now buy and sell as much bitcoin as they want, you can get your bitcoins in just 2 minutes after you press buy and you can use Bitpesa Trade on any smartphone or computer. 
The announcement was made through a blog post on the company's website, which credits the new innovation to feedback from users of their products. 
"We're excited to announce that you can now buy and sell Bitcoin 24/7, all on one page! At BitPesa, we listen to what our customers say and improve your experience with this in mind. In the last few months, we have transitioned from manual trading to an automatic Buy Bitcoin system and now to BitPesa Trade." The post informed. 
This is what you will be able to do once you log into your BitPesa account: 
Calculate the amount of Bitcoin in KES or BTC, add a new wallet or pick from an existing one, pay with M-Pesa and receive Bitcoin instantly, access a Bitcoin Price Chart and view #TradeWithBitPesa updates and events. 
"BitPesa Trade will include better features in the coming months as we continue to improve the experience." The post concluded. East Africa
